Description: Fragment of black figure (?) pottery amphora or oinochoe; low broad flaring ring foot; reconstructed from three joining sherds. Outside covered in slip fired red; surface worn; Red dipinto underneath the base. Hard, fine, red/brown clay; Munsell 2.5YR 6/6 (light reddish brown); some small mica.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (pl. xxxii, right, 2nd from top)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 355)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.129)
